about.title: About Rsoul
about.subtitle: A lightweight Markdown editor focused on frontmatter
about.descriptionLine1: Rsoul is a focused Markdown editor designed for efficient editing of Markdown files and their frontmatter metadata. It provides a clean editing surface, frontmatter management, and quick file operations.
about.descriptionLine2: Core features emphasize frontmatter schema configuration, easy insertion and validation of metadata fields, and a seamless editing workflow for content creators and developers.
about.author: Author:
about.footerNote: Built as a Markdown-focused toolkit with first-class frontmatter support.
